title: Observer status for the Islamic Organization for Food Security in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/C.6/80/L.6 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
8 October 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-16084 (E)    141025     
*2516084* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Sixth Committee 
Agenda item 172 
Observer status for the Islamic Organization for Food 
Security in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
 
 
Afghanistan, Albania, Algeria, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Benin, 
Brunei Darussalam, Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Chad, Comoros, Côte d’Ivoire, 
Djibouti, Egypt, Gabon, Gambia, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Guyana, Indonesia, 
Iran (Islamic Republic of), Iraq, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kuwait, Kyrgyzstan, 
Lebanon, Libya, Malaysia, Maldives, Mali, Mauritania, Morocco, Mozambique, 
Niger, Nigeria, Oman, Pakistan, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Senegal, Sierra Leone, 
Somalia, Sudan, Suriname, Syrian Arab Republic, Tajikistan, Togo, Tunisia, 
Türkiye, Turkmenistan, Uganda, United Arab Emirates, Uzbekistan, Yemen 
and State of Palestine: draft resolution 
 
 
 
 Observer status for the Islamic Organization for Food Security in 
the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the Islamic 
Organization for Food Security, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the Islamic Organization for Food Security to participate 
in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;  
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution.

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the Islamic Organization for Food Security to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
